sentence: Rep. Jaime Herrera Beutler, one of 10 House Republicans who voted to impeach Trump, cited what McCarthy told her about his conversation with the president in her statement explaining her vote.
author: Brent D. Griffiths
title: House Jan. 6 committee subpoenas Kevin McCarthy for his communications with Trump around time of the Capitol attack

sentence: Wins by some of the candidates challenging GOP members who voted to impeach Trump last year, like Reps. Jaime Herrera Beutler (R-Wash.) and Dan Newhouse (R-Wash.), could pad the numbers even more.
title: The primary foreshadowing the future of the GOP
